name: Rifle MarksMan
description:
The plot of the game tells us the story of a retired space paratrooper who has abducted a spouse. Armed with a rifle, he goes in search of her.

Rifle MarksMan is a 2D platformer with a side view, the task is to go through a maze looking for multi-colored keys to the door for further progress through the level. On the way to the cherished goal of the hero awaits many tasks, enemies and of course unfriendly bosses.

Features:
-12 challenging levels
-Pixel graphics
Bosses
-Original music by БЛУdbУК
-Harmonious sound
